data.text: @TTChelps Then u need to stop responding just for response sake

@Concern20201 If there's a driver you want to report, we need to know who it is. That can be done via our phone line or website. If you want me to pass on a general comment that sometimes drivers don't wear masks, I can do that. ^KJ
@TTChelps Hmmm are u here just to comment or u pass on info
@Concern20201 Hi there, they definitely should be wearing a mask and if your driver isn't, you can make a report about that. Please continue to wear it for everyone's safety. ^KJ
@TTChelps Majority of the times drivers not wearing mask so why should we

@TTChelps @chongablackwell No medical condition prevents someone from wearing a mask. Courts have said that people claiming exemptions must prove it. There's no valid reason to not enforce your own policy. The #TTC just doesn't care about safety. #COVID19 #Omicron #TOpoli #TTCspreadsCOVID
@chongablackwell We do have campaigns to educate those who are able to wear a mask on their importance and how to properly wear them. ^TM
